footer.contactAppDescription: Connect directly with our hypnotherapists through our dedicated web application.

hero.title: HypnotherapyChangeYourMind
hero.subtitle1: transform your mind, heal your soul
hero.description: We help people release emotional blockages, overcome fears, and transform their lives through therapeutic hypnosis, safely, respectfully, and effectively.

whatIsHypnotherapy.title: What is Hypnotherapy?
whatIsHypnotherapy.p1: Hypnotherapy is the science that studies the subconscious mind, the origins, and behavioral patterns that affect our daily lives. In hypnotherapy, we don't work with problems or illnesses; we work with the thoughts, attitudes, and behaviors that create problems and illnesses.
whatIsHypnotherapy.p2: Hypnotherapy goes hand in hand with Neurogenesis, allowing us to reconstruct thought patterns to break habits, acquire new skills and ideas, and improve your quality of life.

servicesPreview.title: Featured Services
servicesPreview.description: Explore some of our services designed for your inner healing and transformation.
servicesPreview.pastLifeDesc: Access memories from past lives to find clarity, healing, and purpose.
servicesPreview.pastLifeBanner: Discover the secrets of your soul.
servicesPreview.anxietyDesc: Free yourself from daily pressure and find your inner peace with effective techniques.
servicesPreview.phobiaDesc: Conquer your irrational fears (public speaking, flying, etc.) and live without limits.
servicesPreview.phobiaBanner: Conquer your fears, unleash your potential.

testimonialsPreview.client1Content: Hypnotherapy helped me understand patterns that had no explanation in this life. A revealing experience!
testimonialsPreview.client2Content: I was able to overcome my anxiety and now I feel more confident and in control in my daily life. Totally recommended!
testimonialsPreview.client3Content: Quitting smoking was easier than I imagined thanks to these sessions. My health has improved incredibly!

cta.title: Do you feel like you're carrying unexplained fears or patterns?
cta.p1: Through guided regression, we access memories from previous lives to find clarity, healing, and purpose.

pricing.title: Session Packages
pricing.description: Invest in your well-being with our special packages. Each session lasts 1 to 1.5 hours.
pricing.paymentNote: Remember: Book your consultation with $75 (half the cost of a session) and pay the other half on the day of the session before starting.
pricing.package1Desc: Ideal for a first contact or a specific goal.
pricing.package3Desc: A package to deepen your change process.
pricing.package6Desc: For a more complete and sustained transformation.
pricing.package10Desc: The ultimate commitment to your personal evolution.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We answer your questions about hypnotherapy and our services.
faq.q1: How does the free 30-minute consultation work?
faq.a1: It's an initial conversation to get to know each other, understand your goals, and how hypnotherapy can help you. We will identify attitudes and behaviors to transform. No commitment.
faq.q2: What is neurogenesis and how is it related to hypnotherapy?
faq.a2: Neurogenesis is the brain's ability to create new neurons. Hypnotherapy, along with neuroplasticity (neural restructuring), facilitates this process, allowing for changes in habits and thought patterns to improve your quality of life.
faq.q3: How is payment for sessions made?
faq.a3: For an individual session of $150 (1h - 1h30min), you book your consultation with $75. The other $75 is paid on the day of the session, before starting. Packages have their own payment terms.
faq.q4: What if I need to cancel or reschedule an appointment?
faq.a4: We understand that unforeseen events can occur. We ask you to notify us at least 24 hours in advance to reschedule your session at no additional cost. Cancellations with less notice may be subject to charges.

cta.title: Ready for Your Personal Evolution?
cta.description: Your transformation begins with a decision. Schedule your free consultation or choose the package that resonates with you.

hero.title: About
hero.description: We are a channel of conscious transformation, facilitating personal and emotional awakening so you can live in alignment with your essence.

missionVision.missionText: To help people release emotional blockages, overcome fears, and transform their lives through therapeutic hypnosis, safely, respectfully, and effectively.
missionVision.visionText: To be a channel of conscious transformation, facilitating the personal and emotional awakening of people, so they live aligned with their essence, free from past burdens, and at peace with themselves.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are?
whoWeAre.p1: As professional hypnotherapists, we have the knowledge to induce an absolute state of consciousness in the individual. This allows us to guide you so you can reprogram your mind and achieve profound and lasting transformation.
whoWeAre.p2: Our approach combines the ancestral wisdom of hypnosis with the latest discoveries in neuroscience, creating a unique methodology for your personal evolution.

neurogenesis.title: Neurogenesis and Neuroplasticity
neurogenesis.p1: Neurogenesis is our brain's ability to create new neurons. This process, along with the neural restructuring ability called neuroplasticity, allows our brain to change established thought systems.
neurogenesis.p2: Therefore, neurogenesis allows for changing habits and ideas to improve an individual's quality of life. Our methodology focuses on reorganizing neural pathways to achieve the desired outcome.
neurogenesis.imageOverlay: The power to create new neurons.

ourTeam.title: Our Transformation Team
ourTeam.description: Professionals dedicated to your inner healing and personal evolution, combining experience and a technical-spiritual approach.
ourTeam.julianBio: Julian combines deep hypnotherapy knowledge with NLP techniques to help you unlock your potential and reprogram your mind for success.
ourTeam.sandraBio: Sandra specializes in past life regression and deep emotional healing, guiding you to resolve past burdens and find inner peace.
ourTeam.claudiaBio: With years of experience and a deep understanding of the subconscious mind, Claudia will guide you in your process of transformation and healing.
ourTeam.gabrielBio: Gabriel applies the latest advances in neuroscience to help you restructure thought patterns and achieve your goals.

competitiveDifference.title: Our Competitive Difference
competitiveDifference.mainText: Our methodology related to neurogenesis is unique.
competitiveDifference.subText: We are unique in our approach of reorganizing neural pathways to achieve the desired result, combining therapeutic hypnosis with neuroscience principles for profound and sustainable transformation.

cta.title: Ready to rediscover your inner power?
cta.description: Schedule a free 30-minute consultation and let's explore together how we can help you transform your life.

hero.title: Stories of
hero.subtitle: Transformation and Healing
hero.description: Discover how our unique methodology, focused on neurogenesis and neural reprogramming, has helped people like you achieve their goals and overcome fears.

featuredTestimonial.name: Ana R.
featuredTestimonial.content: Past life regression was a profoundly healing experience. I understood patterns in my current life that had no explanation. I feel lighter and with a renewed purpose. Thank you for this incredible guidance!

moreSuccessStories.title: More Success Stories
moreSuccessStories.description: Real people, real transformations. Get inspired by their stories of emotional release and inner healing.
moreSuccessStories.anaContent: Past life regression was a profoundly healing experience. I understood patterns in my current life that had no explanation. I feel lighter and with a renewed purpose. Thank you for this incredible guidance!
moreSuccessStories.luisContent: For years, anxiety controlled my life. Hypnotherapy sessions gave me practical tools and a new perspective. Now I can manage stress and enjoy each day more. A radical change!
moreSuccessStories.sofiaContent: I tried to quit smoking many times without success. Hypnotherapy was the key. From the first session, I felt a change. I've been smoke-free for 6 months and I feel incredible. My health and my wallet thank you!
moreSuccessStories.javierContent: I had a terrible block about public speaking. Thanks to hypnotherapy, I not only overcame that fear, but now I enjoy presenting my ideas. My self-esteem has grown enormously.
moreSuccessStories.elenaContent: Insomnia was torture. The sessions helped me calm my mind and establish a healthy sleep routine. Now I sleep deeply and wake up energized. It's wonderful!
moreSuccessStories.carlosContent: Preparing for my exams was much less stressful with hypnotherapy. I improved my concentration and information retention. I passed with excellent grades!
